Posts.Content: I have b/c that had one metastatic lesion to brain. Resected, gamma.... know of any long term survivors in this case? Am feeling hopeless and frightened.
Posts.Title: brain met breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thanks... I was dx 9 mo pregnant, triple neg, 7/11 nodes, neo adjuvant, st 3b, in 6/04. Recurrence to brasin 8/06. I would love to hear from others e/brain mets...
